alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sioux and east central Goshen Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Lingle, or 11 miles north of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming.
